name: bmkg-api
description: CLI & library BMKG: wilayah adm4, prakiraan cuaca, peringatan dini CAP, dan data gempabumi.

scripts.build: bun run build:data && bun build src/index.ts --target node --outdir dist --format esm --sourcemap=inline && bun build src/cli.ts --target node --outdir dist --format esm --sourcemap=inline && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('base.csv','dist/base.csv')" && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('base.json','dist/base.json')"
